name: Amazon Guardduty Benchmark
description: The Sumo Logic App for GuardDuty includes preconfigured dashboards that allow you to detect unexpected and potentially malicious activities in your AWS account by providing details on threats by severity, VPC, IP, account ID, region, and by resource type, based on the findings from GuardDuty.

children.name: 1. Amazon GuardDuty - Findings Overview
children.description: See the overview of GuardDuty threats including the severity, threat purpose, resource type, threat name, account ID, and region.

panels.name: GuardDuty Threat Map
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark (geoLocation and lat and lon)
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lon", "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lat", "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.organization.asnOrg", "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.organization.org", "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.organization.isp", "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4" as longitude, latitude, asnOrg, organization, isp, ip
| count by latitude, longitude
| sort _count

panels.name: Threats by Severity and AccountID
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| count by severity, accountId
| transpose row severity column accountId

panels.name: Threats by ThreatPurpose, ResourceType, ThreatName
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| if(!isNull(instanceid),concat ("https://",region,".console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=",region,"#Instances:search=",instanceid),"") as link
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lon" as longitude nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| count as count by ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| sort count

panels.name: Threats by Severity and Region
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| count by severity, region
| transpose row severity column region

panels.name: Threats by IP
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| count by ip
| where !isNull(ip)
| sort _count

panels.name: Severity Trend
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark severity
| json "severity"
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| timeslice 15m
| count by severity, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column severity

panels.name: High Severity Threats Table
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| if(!isNull(instanceid),concat ("https://",region,".console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=",region,"#Instances:search=",instanceid),"") as link
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lon" as longitude nodrop
| where severity = "High"
| timeslice 1m
| count by _timeslice, accountId, region, resourceType, description, link
| order by _timeslice
| fields - _count

panels.name: Threats by Severity and ResourceType
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| count by severity,resourceType
| transpose row severity column resourceType

children.name: 2. Amazon GuardDuty - Finding Details
children.description: See the GuardDuty threat details including the count, account-region trend, threat purpose, severity, resource type, and security group.

panels.name: Threats by Region -  Trend
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as  localPort nodrop
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4" as ip nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, region
| transpose row _timeslice column region

panels.name: Threat Count - One Day Time Comparison
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| where !isNull(localPort)
| count by severity 
| compare with timeshift 1d

panels.name: Threats by ThreatPurpose, Severity
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| if(!isNull(instanceid),concat ("https://",region,".console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=",region,"#Instances:search=",instanceid),"") as link
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lon" as longitude nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| count as count by ThreatPurpose,severity
| transpose row severity column ThreatPurpose

panels.name: Outliers - All Threats
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark accountId region
| json field=_raw "accountId","region","partition","id","arn","type","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.resourceType","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action" as resourceType,serviceName, detectorId, action nodrop 
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4" as ip
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| timeslice 15m
| count as count by _timeslice
| outlier count window=5,threshold=3,consecutive=2,direction=+

panels.name: Threats by Security Group
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| concat(securityGroupName,"-",securityGroupId) as SecurityGroup
| where SecurityGroup<>"-"
| count as count SecurityGroup
| sort by count

panels.name: Threats by ResourceType
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4","networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as ip, localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| count as count resourceType

panels.name: Threat Summary
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark 
| json field=_raw "accountId", "region", "partition", "id", "arn", "type","service.serviceName","service.detectorId","service.action","severity","title","description" nodrop
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as ThreatPurpose,ResourceType,ThreatName
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.ipAddressV4" as ip nodrop
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.localPortDetails.port" as localPort nodrop
| parse "\"vpcId\":\"*\"" as vpcId, "\"subnetId\":\"*\"" as subnetId,"\"groupId\":\"*\"" as securityGroupId,"\"tags\":[*]" as tags,"\"groupName\":\"*\"" as securityGroupName nodrop
| json field=_raw "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId" as instanceid nodrop
| if(severity=0, "Info",if(severity=2, "Low", if(severity=5, "Medium", if(severity=8, "High",if(severity=9.5, "Critical",severity))))) as severity
| if(!isNull(instanceid),concat ("https://",region,".console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=",region,"#Instances:search=",instanceid),"") as link
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lon" as longitude nodrop
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.geoLocation.lat" as latitude nodrop
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.organization.asnOrg" as asnOrg nodrop
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.organization.org" as organization nodrop
| json field=%service.action "networkConnectionAction.remoteIpDetails.organization.isp" as isp nodrop
| count as count by title, accountId, resourceType, organization, isp, ip, link
| sort count

children.name: 3. Amazon GuardDuty - Global Threat Activity Benchmark
children.description: The Amazon GuardDuty - Global Threat Activity Benchmark dashboard provides a high-level baseline of global malicious threats that you can use as a comparison for your AWS environment. Panels display graphs for threat and severity distribution, targeted resources, and detailed information on rare medium and high severity threats.

panels.name: Global Threat Distribution
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| sum(percentage) by threatpurpose | sort _sum

panels.name: Global Distribution Of Threats
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage //| where threatpurpose!="Recon"
| sum(percentage) by threatpurpose, threatname | transpose row threatpurpose column threatname

panels.name: Global Distribution Of Targeted Resources
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| sum(percentage) by resource

panels.name: Threat And Resources They Target
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| sum(percentage) by threatpurpose, resource | transpose row threatpurpose column resource

panels.name: Global Severity By Resource Targeted
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched | percentage * 100 as percentage
| if (severity="2", "2 - Low", if(severity="5", "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity
| sum(percentage) by severity, resource | transpose row resource column severity

panels.name: Global Threat Severity Distribution
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| if (severity="2", "2 - Low", if(severity="5", "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity
| sum(percentage) by severity | sort -severity

panels.name: Global Threat Distribution w/o Recon
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage | where threatpurpose!="Recon"
| sum(percentage) by threatpurpose | sort _sum

panels.name: Globally Rare Medium and High Severity Threats
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | where threatpurpose!="eps" 
| parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, threatvariant nodrop | fields -_some_matched | percentage * 100 as percentage
| if (name="", threatname, name) as threatname
| where percentage<0.02 and severity>=5
| if (severity="2", "2 - Low", if(severity="5", "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity
| fields threatpurpose, threatname, threatvariant, severity, resource, percentage 
| sort -severity, +percentage, threatpurpose
//| sum(percentage) by severity, resource | transpose row resource column severity

children.name: 4. Amazon GuardDuty - Threat Posture Benchmark
children.description: The Amazon GuardDuty - Threat Posture Benchmark dashboard provides a high-level view of the integrity of your AWS environment in comparison to the global threat baseline. Panels then compare high, medium, and low severity global threats to those in your AWS environment. Also shown are the number of rare global threats found in your environment.

panels.name: Global High Severity %
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| sum(percentage) by severity
| where severity=8
| if (severity="2", "2 - Low", if(severity="5", "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity

panels.name: Description
panels.properties:
{"version":3,"settings":{"table":{"version":2,"configuration":{"textTruncationMode":"none","fontSize":"medium","fontSizeOverride":null}},"bar":{"chartType":"bar","version":2,"configuration":{"colors":{"index":null,"overrides":null},"legend":{"enabled":true,"position":"right","dimensions":{"width":null,"height":null}},"plotOptions":{"stacking":null,"lineToArea":false},"xAxis":{"title":null,"label":{"truncationMode":"middle"},"minorTickInterval":null},"yAxis":[{"title":null,"logScale":false,"min":null,"max":null,"bands":null,"minorTickInterval":null}],"seriesInfo":{},"showLineMarker":true,"lineMouseTracking":true}},"column":{"chartType":"column","version":2,"configuration":{"colors":{"index":null,"overrides":null},"legend":{"enabled":true,"position":"right","dimensions":{"width":null,"height":null}},"plotOptions":{"stacking":null,"lineToArea":false},"xAxis":{"title":null,"label":{"truncationMode":"middle"},"minorTickInterval":null},"yAxis":[{"title":null,"logScale":false,"min":null,"max":null,"bands":null,"minorTickInterval":null}],"seriesInfo":{},"showLineMarker":true,"lineMouseTracking":true}},"line":{"chartType":"line","version":2,"configuration":{"colors":{"index":null,"overrides":null},"legend":{"enabled":true,"position":"right","dimensions":{"width":null,"height":null}},"plotOptions":{"stacking":null,"lineToArea":false},"xAxis":{"title":null,"label":{"truncationMode":"middle"},"minorTickInterval":null},"yAxis":[{"title":null,"logScale":false,"min":null,"max":null,"bands":null,"minorTickInterval":null}],"seriesInfo":{},"showLineMarker":true,"lineMouseTracking":true}},"area":{"chartType":"area","version":2,"configuration":{"colors":{"index":null,"overrides":null},"legend":{"enabled":true,"position":"right","dimensions":{"width":null,"height":null}},"plotOptions":{"stacking":null,"lineToArea":false},"xAxis":{"title":null,"label":{"truncationMode":"middle"},"minorTickInterval":null},"yAxis":[{"title":null,"logScale":false,"min":null,"max":null,"bands":null,"minorTickInterval":null}],"seriesInfo":{},"showLineMarker":true,"lineMouseTracking":true}},"pie":{"chartType":"pie","version":3,"configuration":{"donutMode":true,"colors":{"index":null,"overrides":null},"legend":{"enabled":true,"position":"right"},"plotOptions":{"label":{"truncationMode":"middle"},"showSliceBorders":true,"maxNumOfPieSlices":"10"}}},"boxplot":{"chartType":"boxplot","version":1,"configuration":{"xAxis":{"title":null,"label":{"truncationMode":"middle"}},"yAxis":{"title":null,"min":null,"max":null}}},"map":{"chartType":"map","version":1,"configuration":{"maptype":"cluster"}},"svv":{"version":2,"configuration":{"colorOverride":null,"backgroundColorEnabled":false,"noDataBehavior":{"enabled":false,"color":"#cccccc","value":null,"isString":null},"valueType":{"number":{"showNumber":true,"unit":null,"colorsByValueRange":null},"boolean":{"trueColor":"#6aa84f","falseColor":"#cc0000"}},"labels":{"prefix":{"enabled":false,"text":"","align":"left"},"postfix":{"enabled":false,"text":"","align":"right"}}}},"sankey":{"version":1,"configuration":{}},"text":{"version":1,"configuration":{"text":"### GuardDuty Global Intelligence Is Designed To
* Show where your security posture differs from baseline
* Identify deviations that could indicate security gaps
* Find rare threat activity that might otherwise go unnoticed


### Comparison with Baseline
* Baseline data is normalized to 1 and is represented by the thick red line for Threat Purpose, Threat Severity, and Threat Resource in order to provide you a quick visual comparison."}},"metrics":{"version":2,"configuration":{"blockSettings":{},"viewType":"timeline","zoom":"xy","yAxis":{"defaults":[{"name":""},{"name":""}],"custom":[{},{}]},"xAxis":{"scrubber":true},"outliers":{"enabled":true,"top":1,"scope":"Chart","cyclicality":false,"threshold":7,"autoShowBand":true},"colorFamily":"METRIC_DEFAULT"}},"common":{"version":1,"configuration":{"drilldown":{"fallback":{"target":{"id":null,"name":null,"enabled":null}}}}}}}

panels.name: Your Medium Severity
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark | json "severity" as severity //| where severity=8
| count by severity | total _count as numevents | _count / numevents as percent | fields severity, percent | percent*100 as percent
| where severity=5
| if (severity=2, "2 - Low", if(severity=5, "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity

panels.name: Global Low Severity %
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| sum(percentage) by severity
| where severity=2

panels.name: Your Low Severity
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark | json "severity" as severity //| where severity=8
| count by severity | total _count as numevents | _count / numevents as percent | fields severity, percent | percent*100 as percent
| where severity=2

panels.name: Number Of Globally Rare Threat Types In Your Data
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark
// PARSE
| json field=_raw "id", "type","severity" ,"title","description"
| toint(severity) as sev
//| where sev>2 
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as threatPurpose, targetResource, threatName
| count by threatPurpose, threatName, targetResource, sev
| benchmark percentage as global_percent from guardduty on threatpurpose=threatPurpose, threatname=threatName, severity=sev, resource=targetresource
| if(global_percent=0, 0.000001, global_percent) as global_percent
| if (sev >= 7, concat(sev," - High") , if (sev >= 4 , concat(sev," - Medium"), concat(sev," - Low"))) as severity
| total _count as totalevents | _count/totalevents as percentage
| total global_percent as total_global_percent
| where global_percent<.002
| count

panels.name: Targeted Resource
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark | json "type" as type | parse field=type "*:*/" as tp, resourceType
| count by resourceType | total _count as numevents | _count / numevents as percent | fields resourceType, percent
| benchmark percentage as global from guardduty on resource=resourceType
// ratio
| 1 as baseline | percent / global as you | fields resourceType, baseline, you

panels.name: Threat Purpose
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark | json "type" | parse field=type "*:" as purpose | count by purpose | total _count as numevents 
| _count / numevents as percent | fields purpose, percent
| benchmark percentage as global from guardduty on threatPurpose=purpose
| if(global=0, 0.000001, global) as global
// ratio
| 1 as baseline | percent / global as you | fields purpose, baseline, you

panels.name: Your Threats vs. Global Baseline
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark
| json field=_raw "severity"| toint(severity)
| parse "\"type\":\"*:*/" as purpose,resource
| timeslice 1d
| count by purpose, severity, resource, _timeslice 
| total _count as numevents by _timeslice
| join
//purpose
( sum(_count), max(numevents) by purpose,_timeslice 
| benchmark percentage as global from guardduty on threatpurpose=purpose
| _sum / _max as percent | if(global=0, 0.000001, global) as global
| percent / global as ratio | avg(ratio) as purpose_ratio by _timeslice ) as t1, 
//severity
( sum(_count), max(numevents) by severity,_timeslice  
| benchmark percentage as global from guardduty on severity=severity
| _sum / _max as percent | if(global=0, 0.000001, global) as global
| percent / global as ratio | avg(ratio) as severity_ratio by _timeslice ) as t2, 
//resource
( sum(_count), max(numevents) by resource,_timeslice 
| benchmark percentage as global from guardduty on resource=resource
| _sum / _max as percent | if(global=0, 0.000001, global) as global
| percent / global as ratio | avg(ratio) as resource_ratio by _timeslice ) as t3
//join
on t1._timeslice= t2._timeslice and t1._timeslice=t3._timeslice
| t1__timeslice as _timeslice
| max(t1_purpose_ratio) as purpose, max(t2_severity_ratio) as severity, max(t3_resource_ratio) as resource by _timeslice

panels.name: Your High Severity
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark | json "severity" as severity //| where severity=8
| count by severity | total _count as numevents | _count / numevents as percent | fields severity, percent | percent*100 as percent
| where severity=8
| if (severity=2, "2 - Low", if(severity=5, "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity

panels.name: Threat Severity
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark | json "severity" as severity
| count by severity | total _count as numevents | _count / numevents as percent | fields severity, percent
| toint(severity) | benchmark percentage as global from guardduty on severity=severity
| if (severity=2, "2 - Low", if(severity=5, "5 - Medium", "8 - High")) as severity
// ratio
| 1 as baseline | percent / global as you| fields severity, baseline, you

panels.name: Global Medium Severity %
panels.queryString:
benchmarkcat guardduty | parse field=threatname "*.*" as name, variant nodrop | fields -_some_matched| percentage * 100 as percentage
| sum(percentage) by severity
| where severity=5

children.name: 5. Amazon GuardDuty - Threat Details Benchmark
children.description: The Amazon GuardDuty - Threat Details Benchmark dashboard provides a high-level view of threats in your AWS environment versus a baseline of global threats, paired with detailed information on severity rankings. Panels also show information on the globally rare threats found in your AWS environment.

panels.name: Number Of Globally Rare Threat Types Found In Your Data
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark
// PARSE
| json field=_raw "id", "type","severity" ,"title","description"
| toint(severity) as sev
//| where sev>2 
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as threatPurpose, targetResource, threatName
| count by threatPurpose, threatName, targetResource, sev
| benchmark percentage as global_percent from guardduty on threatpurpose=threatPurpose, threatname=threatName, severity=sev, resource=targetresource
| if(global_percent=0, 0.000001, global_percent) as global_percent
| if (sev >= 7, concat(sev," - High") , if (sev >= 4 , concat(sev," - Medium"), concat(sev," - Low"))) as severity
| total _count as totalevents | _count/totalevents as percentage
| total global_percent as total_global_percent
| where global_percent<.002
| count

panels.name: Detail Of Globally Rare Events We Found In Your Data
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark
// PARSE
| json field=_raw "id", "type","severity" ,"title","description", "accountId", "resource.resourceType", "region" //| %"resource.resourceType" as resourceType | fields -%"resource.resourceType"
| toint(severity) as sev
//| where sev>2 
| if (sev >= 7, concat(sev," - High") , if (sev >= 4 , concat(sev," - Medium"), concat(sev," - Low"))) as severity
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as threatPurpose, targetResource, threatName

// resource
| json "resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId", "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId", "resource.accessKeyDetails.userName" nodrop
| if(isNull(%"resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId"), %"resource.instanceDetails.instanceId", %"resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId") as targetResourceId
| if(isNull(targetResourceId), %"resource.accessKeyDetails.userName", targetResourceId) as targetResourceId

| count as your_count by threatPurpose, threatName, severity, sev, region, accountid, targetResource, targetResourceId, description
| benchmark percentage as global_percent from guardduty on threatpurpose=threatPurpose, threatname=threatName, severity=sev, resource=targetresource
| if(global_percent=0, 0.000001, global_percent) as global_percent
| total your_count as totalevents | your_count/totalevents as percentage
| total global_percent as total_global_percent
| where global_percent<.002 
| if(severity="8 - High", ":stop-sign:", if (severity="5 - High", ":raised-hand:", ":raised-hand:")) as icon
| lookup utf as %" " from https://s3.amazonaws.com/sumologic-app-data/emoji.csv on shortname=icon
| fields threatpurpose, threatname, %" ", severity, description, region, accountid, targetresource, targetResourceId, your_count | sort -severity

panels.name: Your Threats vs. Global Baseline
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark
// PARSE
| json field=_raw "id", "type","severity" ,"title","description", "accountId", "resource.resourceType", "region"
| toint(severity) as sev
//| where sev>2 
| if (sev >= 7, concat(sev," - High") , if (sev >= 4 , concat(sev," - Medium"), concat(sev," - Low"))) as severity
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as threatPurpose, targetResource, threatName
// resource
| json "resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId", "resource.instanceDetails.instanceId", "resource.accessKeyDetails.userName" nodrop
| if(isNull(%"resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId"), %"resource.instanceDetails.instanceId", %"resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId") as targetResourceId
| if(isNull(targetResourceId), %"resource.accessKeyDetails.userName", targetResourceId) as targetResourceId

| count as your_count by threatPurpose, threatName, targetResource, severity, sev, region, accountid, targetResourceId, description
| benchmark percentage as global_percent from guardduty on threatpurpose=threatPurpose, threatname=threatName, severity=sev, resource=targetresource
| if(global_percent=0, 0.000001, global_percent) as global_percent
| total your_count as totalevents | your_count/totalevents as percentage
| total global_percent as total_global_percent
| global_percent / total_global_percent as localized_global_baseline
| percentage / localized_global_baseline as ratio
| if(ratio>1.25, "Higher", if (ratio<0.75, "Lower", "In line")) as you_vs_baseline
| format("%.1f", ratio) as ratio
| if(ratio>1.25, ":red-triangle-pointed-up:", if (ratio<0.75, ":large-orange-diamond:", ":large-orange-diamond:")) as icon
| lookup utf as %"  " from https://s3.amazonaws.com/sumologic-app-data/emoji.csv on shortname=icon
| if(severity="8 - High", ":stop-sign:", if (severity="5 - High", ":raised-hand:", ":raised-hand:")) as icon
| lookup utf as %" " from https://s3.amazonaws.com/sumologic-app-data/emoji.csv on shortname=icon
| fields threatPurpose, threatName, %" ", severity, description, region, accountid, targetResource, targetResourceId, %"  ", you_vs_baseline, ratio, your_count
| sort -severity,+you_vs_baseline, -ratio

panels.name: Statistical Profile Of Your Threats vs Baseline(Red=higher, Green=lower)
panels.queryString:
$$gdbenchmark
// PARSE
| json field=_raw "id", "type","severity" ,"title","description"
| toint(severity) as sev
//| where sev>2 
| if (sev >= 7, concat(sev," - High") , if (sev >= 4 , concat(sev," - Medium"), concat(sev," - Low"))) as severity
| parse field=type "*:*/*" as threatPurpose, targetResource, threatName
| concat (threatpurpose, ":", threatname, ":", targetresource, ":", severity) as threat
| count by threatPurpose, threatName, targetResource, threat, severity, sev
| benchmark percentage as global_percent from guardduty on threatpurpose=threatPurpose, threatname=threatName, severity=sev, resource=targetresource
| if(global_percent=0, 0.000001, global_percent) as global_percent
| if (isnull(global_percent), 0, global_percent) as global_percent //in case event was not in baseline or only one event, set to 0 instead of null
| total _count as totalevents | _count/totalevents as percentage
| total global_percent as total_global_percent
| if (global_percent=total_global_percent, 0.001, global_percent / total_global_percent) as localized_global_baseline //in case event was not in baseline or only one event
| percentage / localized_global_baseline as ratio
| ratio-1 as ratio | tanh(ratio) as sig
| sort -ratio
| fields threat, sig
